title: Northlight 18.5" Brown and White Sitting Tabletop Gnome Christmas Decoration
features: Hat is adjustable to position where you would like it
Long white beard comes down to a point
Tan brown boots and hands with striped legs and arms
Soft dangling legs perfect for sitting on the edge of your desk or mantle
description: Gnomes are best known for guarding Earthly treasures, providing good luck, and are perfect for protecting your Christmas goodies! Add this adorable gnome to your holiday decor for a dash of cuteness. Perfect to start or add to your gnome collection for the holidays! Features:. Tabletop gnome Christmas decoration. Brown knit hat with matching socks. Brown fleece overalls. Tan brown boots and hands. Striped leggings. Beige boots and mittens. Legs hang over the edge of the surface he sits on Dimensions:18.5"H x 5.5"W x 4"D. Material(s):polyester
